heroSection.title: ROBI FITNESS
heroSection.subtitle: Where strength meets determination. Your journey to a stronger, better you starts here.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.description: ROBI Fitness Center is more than just a gym—it’s a family. Located in Hawassa, we’ve created a welcoming environment where members of all fitness levels can achieve their goals. Our passionate team of trainers and state-of-the-art facilities ensure you get the support and guidance needed to succeed.

bmiSection.heading: Every rep brings you closer to greatness

testimonials.quote: I wanted to lose weight after giving birth, but I wasn’t sure where to start. Andres helped me create a plan that fit my lifestyle, and I ended up losing 20 pounds while feeling more energetic and healthy. His coaching has made a huge impact on my life!
testimonials.name: Meheret Alemu

testimonials.quote: Before working with Andres, I struggled with back pain and gaining strength for powerlifting. After hiring him, I was able to drop 30 pounds, eliminate my back pain, and hit lifetime PRs at my powerlifting meet—all while celebrating the birth of my daughter. Andres is the best coach out there!
testimonials.name: Eden Gebreselassie

testimonials.quote: I had been overweight for years and struggled to stay consistent with workouts. With Andres' guidance, I lost 25 pounds, improved my overall fitness, and gained more muscle than I ever thought possible. I'm stronger and more confident now.
testimonials.name: Bereket Tesfaye

testimonials.quote: I wanted to lose weight after giving birth, but I wasn’t sure where to start. Andres helped me create a plan that fit my lifestyle, and I ended up losing 20 pounds while feeling more energetic and healthy. His coaching has made a huge impact on my life!
testimonials.name: Meheret Alemu

sections.title: About Robi Fitness
sections.content: Robi Fitness is dedicated to fostering a supportive environment where individuals of all fitness levels can thrive. Our gym offers state-of-the-art equipment and expert trainers who are passionate about helping you achieve your fitness goals.

sections.title: Our Philosophy
sections.content: At Robi Fitness, we believe in a holistic approach to health and wellness. Fitness isn't just about physical strength — it's about building mental resilience, confidence, and overall well-being.

sections.title: Our Facilities & Trainers
sections.content: Robi Fitness is equipped with the latest fitness technology and an inspiring space designed for every fitness level. Our experienced trainers are here to support your growth, offering personalized guidance to help you maximize your potential.

body_building.heading: Achieve your fitness goals with our dedicated bodybuilding packages.

monthly.title: Monthly
description: Unlimited gym access with personalized bodybuilding coaching.
Includes two 1:1 coaching sessions per week.
Free access to one special bodybuilding event each month.

three_months.title: 3 Months
description: Access for three months with regular progress check-ins and assessments.
Includes access to nutritional workshops and meal plans.
Monthly performance tracking and progress reports.

six_months.title: 6 Months
description: Half-year access to gym facilities, including all bodybuilding equipment.
Free nutritional tracking and monthly assessments.
Discount on fitness and wellness workshops.

yearly.title: Yearly
description: Full year of access to all bodybuilding equipment and classes.
Priority booking for 1:1 coaching and diet consultations.
Exclusive discounts on supplements and apparel.

exercise.heading: Stay fit and energized with various exercise options for all levels.

per_day.title: Per day
per_day.description: Come to our gym get access to all exercise equipment and classes.

in_person.title: 20 Days (With Coupon)
description: 20 days of gym and class access with optional fitness tracking.
Eligible for a discount on future memberships.
Access to one free group fitness class.

monthly.title: Monthly (12 days)
description: One-month access to gym and classes with weekly fitness assessments.
Access to member-only fitness workshops and discounts on training packages.

three_months.title: 3 Months
description: Three months of access to all exercise equipment and classes.
Weekly check-ins with a fitness coach and personalized workout plans.
Free entry to one special fitness event per month.

yearly.title: Yearly
description: One year of full gym access, including special fitness programs and classes.
Monthly fitness progress tracking and goal-setting meetings.
Priority access to limited-time fitness workshops and events.
